short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to Rick Roll friends who forget to lock their computer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are your coworkers always leaving their computers unlocked? Looking for a fun and harmless April Fool's Day prank? Look no further! This simple extension will randomly Rick Roll your friends while they browse the web.
